title: How to Get Walking Wake: Trades & Limited-Time Event Tera Raid Battles

steps.title: Currently, the only way to get Walking Wake is to trade.
steps.content: Currently, the only way to get Walking Wake is to trade. Walking Wake's Tera Raid Battle is not currently available, so the only way to get this Paradox Pokémon is via trade. While it may be difficult to find someone who is willing to trade a Walking Wake, it's not totally impossible. If you aren't sure where to start looking for trades, there are a few active subreddits dedicated to trading Pokémon: /r/pokemontrades , /r/CasualPokemonTrades , and /r/PokemonSVTrades .

steps.title: Wait for the Walking Wake and Iron Leaves Tera Raid Battles to return.
steps.content: Wait for the Walking Wake and Iron Leaves Tera Raid Battles to return. The Walking Wake and Iron Leaves Tera Raid Battles rerun from time to time. Keep an eye on Pokémon news and the Poké Portal News in-game for a rerun of these Tera Raid Battles. [1] X Research source In the meantime, if you don't have 5-Star Tera Raid Battles unlocked, this would be a good time to unlock them so you're prepared for Walking Wake's rerun. 5-Star Tera Raids are unlocked in the postgame of Pokémon Scarlet and Violet, and you must host and complete about 10 to 15 5-Star Tera Raids to unlock 6-Star Tera Raid Battles . The Walking Wake and Iron Leaves Tera Raid Battles previously ran from February 27, 2023 to March 12, 2023; May 1, 2023 to May 14, 2023; December 25, 2023 to January 7, 2024; and April 26, 2024 to May 6, 2024. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Look for sparkling 5-Star Water Tera Type caverns when the raid event comes back.
steps.content: Look for sparkling 5-Star Water Tera Type caverns when the raid event comes back. If you have Pokémon Scarlet, you can find Walking Wake's Tera Raid caverns in your own game. However, if you have Pokémon Violet, you'll need to connect to the internet and find Walking Wake Tera Raid Battles online. If you already caught a Walking Wake during a previous Tera Raid Battle event, you can't catch another one. You can, however, repeat the Tera Raid Battle for other rewards .
